overview:
As the Managing Partner, Mr. McWhorter has directed investments made by Clayton Associates in FCA III and FCA II, and advised on co-investments made by Clayton Associates with FCA I. Prior to founding Clayton Associates, Mr. McWhorter was Founder and Vice President of Acquisitions for OrthoLink Physicians Corp., a physician services and surgery center management company.

Mr. McWhorter currently serves on the Board of Directors of Censis Technologies, Inc., HCCA International, Alveolus, Inc., Attentus Healthcare Company, SpineMedica, Inc., Discovery Life Sciences, L.P., Tenvera, Inc., Dara, Inc. and Haven Behavioral Healthcare Inc., each of which is a company in the Clayton Associates Portfolio.
